channel.title: Menu help (please!)
channel.description:
ok, i need help with changing my client around
some clients have the menu bye the title saying. "file" "take screen shot"
well i azm usering eviltionx client with out that. but i see in user scrreen shots that the client did have that screen shot. is there any way i can add the menu to evltionx client?
please i need help on it
another ex is pk planet has the website thing at the top that u can click for website to pop up

item.description:

ok, i need help with changing my client around

some clients have the menu bye the title saying. “file” “take screen shot”

well i azm usering eviltionx client with out that. but i see in user scrreen shots that the client did have that screen shot. is there any way i can add the menu to evltionx client?
